snippet: A look at the issues confronting teachers trying to explore climate science amid heated public debate.
abstract: A look at the issues confronting teachers trying to explore climate science amid heated public debate.
lead_paragraph: It used to be sex ed that got science teachers into challenging situations once in awhile. Evolution, too, of course. Increasingly, the "C" word, climate, is creating challenges for educators trying to explore the heat-trapping properties of carbon dioxide and the implications for climate as concentrations of CO2 and other greenhouse gases rise.
